main_text.sentence: This issue has been controversial; some authors suggest that the relationship between prolonged breast-feeding and malnutrition may indicate a maternal decision to continue breast-feeding to a nutritionally disadvantaged child [37-39], rather than being the direct effect of prolonging breast-feeding on the child's nutritional status [40].
